channel.title: Python on Sławek Gonet
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Sławek Gonet

item.title: burp_exporter
item.description: Prometheus exporter for BURP backup program burp written in Python. burp_exporter operates directly on BURP spool directory thus has to be running on the same machine as server, but does not require complex configuration as a client of monitor protocol. See burp_exporter on GitHub for more info.
